title: Gorillas in the Mist: The Story of Dian Fossey
creator_credit: Terence A. Clegg, Arne Glimcher, Guber-Peters Company and Michael Apted
brief_description: Based on the true story of anthropologist Dian Fossey who travels to the African mountains to study the rare gorillas. Her interest in the mountain gorillas becomes an obsession and she risks her life to protect them from poachers and animal traders and ultimate extinction. Stars Sigourney Weaver and Bryan Brown.
